channel.title: Wildy Help!
channel.description: My server is ALL wildy but a few safe spots....how do i make it so that it is all safe......except for the wilderness???????

item.title: Wildy Help!
item.dc:creator: @Bigbucks Bigbucks
item.description:
@Bigbucks wrote:

thank you. It worked!

Read full topic

item.title: Wildy Help!
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

If you have a 317 server, I can help you.

Make a backup of client.java so nothing bad happens if you screw up.

First open client.java and search for: public boolean nonWild
Then you see something like this public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >=2887 && absX <=2927 && absY >=9670 && absY <=9698 )||(absX >=2895 && absX <=2923 && absY >=9714 && absY <=9745 )||(absX >=2753 && absX <=2806 && absY >=9177 && absY <=9216 )|| (absX >=3368 && absX <=3383 && absY >=9744 && absY <=9757 )|| (absX >=3378 && absX <=3384 && absY >=9741 && absY <=9756 )|| (absX >=3368 && absX <=3367 && absY >=9744 && absY <=9751 )|| (absX >=3373 && absX <=3365 && absY >=9765 && absY <=9771 )|| (absX >=3365 && absX <=3371 && absY >=9768 && absY <=9771 )||(absX >=3372 && absX <=3365 && absY >=9767 && absY <=9766 )||(absX >=3365 && absX <=3372 && absY >=9767 && absY <=9764 )||(absX >=3372 && absX <=3365 && absY >=9767 && absY <=9766 )|| (absX >=3367 && absX <=3374 && absY >=9765 && absY <=9767 )||(absX >=3365 && absX <=3372 && absY >=9767 && absY <=9764 )|| (absX >=3372 && absX <=3365 && absY >=9764 && absY <=9767 )|| (absX >=3369 && absX <=3372 && absY >=9764 && absY <=9764 )|| (absX >=3365 && absX <=3366 && absY >=9767 && absY <=9766 )|| (absX >=3365 && absX <=3366 && absY >=9766 && absY <=9767 )|| (absX >=3437 && absX <=3430 && absY >=9772 && absY <=9777 )|| (absX >=3430 && absX <=3437 && absY >=9772 && absY <=9777 )|| (absX >=3350 && absX <=3337 && absY >=3473 && absY <=3460 )|| (absX >=3352 && absX <=3337 && absY >=3461 && absY <=3471 )|| (absX >=3352 && absX <=3342 && absY >=3461 && absY <=3473 )|| (absX >=3344 && absX <=3336 && absY >=3471 && absY <=3460 )|| (absX >=3344 && absX <=3349 && absY >=3459 && absY <=3471 )|| (absX >=3340 && absX <=3339 && absY >=3460 && absY <=3471 )|| (absX >=3343 && absX <=3338 && absY >=3459 && absY <=3469 )|| (absX >=3338 && absX <=3343 && absY >=3460 && absY <=3470 )|| (absX >=3337 && absX <=3337 && absY >=3470 && absY <=3460 )|| (absX >=3378 && absX <=3371 && absY >=9740 && absY <=9743 )|| (absX >=3371 && absX <=3377 && absY >=9740 && absY <=9743 )|| (absX >=2905 && absX <=2916 && absY >=9903 && absY <=9909 )|| (absX >=1889 && absX <=1906 && absY >=5333 && absY <=5346 )|| (absX >=2284 && absX <=2300 && absY >=3120 && absY <=3160 )|| (absX >=2393 && absX <=2404 && absY >=5169 && absY <=5174 )|| (absX >=2308 && absX <=2320 && absY >=3169 && absY <=3197 )|| (absX >=2873 && absX <=2880 && absY >=9793 && absY <=9800 )|| (absX >=3008 && absX <=3124 && absY >=3825 && absY <=3881 )|| (absX >=2895 && absX <=2904 && absY >=3720 && absY <=3766 )|| (absX >=2887 && absX <=2894 && absY >=3754 && absY <=3765 )|| (absX >=2847 && absX <=2863 && absY >=9629 && absY <=9646 )|| (absX >=3201 && absX <=3226 && absY >=3201 && absY <=3236 )|| (absX >=3227 && absX <=3229 && absY >=3212 && absY <=3225 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Make a new line and paste this to it (absX >=xxxx && absX <=zzzz && absY >=yyyy && absY <=uuuu )||

You need to change the xxxx’s, zzzz’s, yyyy’s and uuuu’s to the x and y coords you want.
xxxx is the westest point of the safezone
zzzz is the eastest point of the safezone
yyyy is the southest point of the safezone
and uuuu is the northest point of the safezone

I know Im not good at explaining things. Here’s a picture that might help you:

Blue = X coords
Cyan = Y coords

Save and compile.

Post if you get any errors.

Read full topic
